Questions I Hear While Folding Time

Is this legal?

In 23 states, yes. In 9 states, spiritually yes. In the rest, we call it "textile-adjacent emotional care."

Will I forget people I love?

No. Love is protein. We remove only the sauce.

Why does Tuesday move backwards?

A leak in Bay 3 met a lunar pull in 2016. I patched the wall and kept the miracle.
